FuncDef: This command specifies the out-of-profile LSP EXP value for the forwarding class. The EXP value will be used for all LSP labeled packets that require marking at egress on this forwarding class queue, and that are out-of-profile. The exceed-profile traffic is marked with the same value as out-of-profile traffic.

ParaDef.Info: The 3-bit MPLS EXP bit value, expressed as a decimal integer. Values-0 to 7.

ExtraInfo:
Default: Policy-id 1:Factory setting
Policy-id 2 to 65535:Policy-id setting
